languages.text: [Обратиться с ярой проповедью] "Пусть слова мои станут пламенем Его!"
[Give an impassioned sermon] "Let my words become His flame!"

languages.text: [Eine leidenschaftliche Predigt halten] "Mögen meine Worte Seine Flamme sein!"
languages.original_text: [Give an impassioned sermon] "Let my words become His flame!"

traits.locale_text: [Eine leidenschaftliche Predigt halten] "Mögen meine Worte Seine Flamme sein!"

languages.text: [Faire un sermon passionné] « Que mes mots deviennent Sa flamme ! »
languages.original_text: [Give an impassioned sermon] "Let my words become His flame!"

traits.locale_text: [Faire un sermon passionné] « Que mes mots deviennent Sa flamme ! »

languages.text: [Pronunciar un sermón apasionado] «¡Que mis palabras se conviertan en Su llama!».
languages.original_text: [Give an impassioned sermon] "Let my words become His flame!"

traits.locale_text: [Pronunciar un sermón apasionado] «¡Que mis palabras se conviertan en Su llama!».

languages.text: [熱のこもった説教をする]「我が言葉を、主の炎とせよ！」
languages.original_text: [Give an impassioned sermon] "Let my words become His flame!"

traits.locale_text: [熱のこもった説教をする]「我が言葉を、主の炎とせよ！」

languages.text: [进行一场慷慨激昂的布道]“愿我的话语成为祂的烈焰！”
languages.original_text: [Give an impassioned sermon] "Let my words become His flame!"

languages.text: [Tutkulu bir vaaz ver] "Sözlerim O'nun alevi olsun!"
